sentences.en: All these people lined up for the Princess Princess show?
sentences.cn: 这些人都在排队等候参加princess演唱会 吗 ?

sentences.en: And Princess Diana, aged 20, was on her honeymoon with Prince Charles.
sentences.cn: 那时20岁戴安娜王妃正在与查尔斯王子共度蜜月.

sentences.en: At her wedding the new princess certainly looked the part.
sentences.cn: 王妃在婚礼上还挺是那么回事.

sentences.en: Diana, the Princess of Wales, was one of the greatest egalitarians.
sentences.cn: 英国王妃戴安娜是一位最伟大的平等主义拥护者.

sentences.en: Performers included Elton John and Duran Duran, favorites of the late princess.
sentences.cn: 包括埃而顿·约翰和杜兰·杜兰的演奏,都是前(已故)王妃所喜欢的.

sentences.en: She performs the duties of a princess with great aplomb.
sentences.cn: 她泰然自若地履行王妃的职责.

sentences.en: The late Diana, Princess of Wales was in eighth place.
sentences.cn: 英国已故王妃戴安娜排名第8.

sentences.en: The newspaper gave a two - page account of the Princess'funeral.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸用了两个版面叙述了王妃的葬礼.

sentences.en: The princess consort is wearing an invaluable necklace during the celebration.
sentences.cn: 庆典时,王妃脖子里戴着价值连城的璎珞.

sentences.en: The Princess of Wales laid the foundation stone for the extension to the Cathedral.
sentences.cn: 威尔士王妃为大教堂的扩建奠基。

sentences.en: The princess's coat was of red silk laced with gold thread.
sentences.cn: 王妃的外衣是镶有金线的红色绸缎做的.

sentences.en: The Princess's sitting-room leads off the drawing room.
sentences.cn: 王妃的起居室挨着客厅。

sentences.en: This newspaper devoted two pages to describing the funeral of the princess.
sentences.cn: 5这家报纸用了两个版面叙述了王妃的葬礼.

sentences.en: TO some, she was Princess Diana, a global human rights campaigner.
sentences.cn: 对有些人来说, 她是王妃, 是一名为全球人权问题不懈奋斗的战士.

phrases.tran_cn: 小公主（原著为小说，后多次改编为电影、电视剧和动画）
n. 将继承王位的公主；女王储
幽灵公主；魔法公主（动画电影）

trans.tran_cn: 公主，王妃（王族女性成员），女巨头，女名家，<古>女王
trans.tran_en: a close female relation of a king and queen, especially a daughter
